clinical_study.brief_title: Chemotherapy Combined With Yangzhengxiaoji Capsule in Patients With Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized,Double-blind,Placebo-Controlled,Multicenter Clinical Trail of Chemotherapy Combined With Yangzhengxiaoji Capsule in Patients With Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to observe quality of life and treatment side effects in patients with advanced non small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) receive chemotherapy and Yangzhengxiaoji capsule.

primary_outcome.measure: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lung scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Anti-cancer drugs common grading evaluation of adverse reaction

arm_group.description: Gemcitabine or Pemetrexed Cisplatin Yangzhengxiaoji Capsule four granules t.i.d po
Gemcitabine or Pemetrexed Cisplatin Placebo Capsule four granules t.i.d po

intervention.description: Gemcitabine 1000mg/m² or Pemetrexed 500mg/m² IV drip on D1 and D8,21 days for a cycle. Cisplatin 75mg/m² IV drip for one day or two-three days total injection,21 days for a cycle. Yangzhengxiaoji Capsule four granules t.i.d po.
